alignmentConfig.name: Alignment Damage Susceptibility
alignmentConfig.hint: Determines which types of creatures can be affected by alignment damage. "Non-matching" refers to creatures lacking the corresponding trait, e.g. a neutral creature would take Good damage, but a Good aligned creature would not.
alignmentConfig.applySpirit: Apply all alignment damage as spirit damage
alignmentConfig.replace: Replace with spirit damage on roll

bleedConfig.name: Persistent Bleed Damage Susceptibility
bleedConfig.hint: Determines which types of creatures can be affected by persistent bleed damage.

vitalityConfig.name: Vitality Damage Susceptibility
vitalityConfig.hint: Determines which types of creatures can be affected by vitality damage.

voidConfig.name: Void Damage Susceptibility
voidConfig.hint: Determines which types of creatures can be affected by void damage.

precisionConfig.name: Precision Damage Immunity
precisionConfig.hint: Determines behavior of precision immunity. Physical resistance replacement uses low value of level-based resistances.
